code: import axios from"axios";const API_URL="https://redteagame.ddns.me/NodeAPI/express/myapp/api/user";class AuthService{login(email,password){return axios.post(API_URL+"/login",{email,password});}logout(){localStorage.removeItem("user");}register(username,email,password,role){return axios.post(API_URL+"/register",{username,email,password,role});}getCurrentUser(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user"));}}export default new AuthService();
